exceptions.exn: The LHS of Series_scal_l (Series (fun n : nat => _ * _ n)) does not match any subterm of the goal
In environment H : forall (c : R) (a : nat -> R), Series (fun n : nat => c * a n) = c * Series a c : R a : nat -> R Unable to unify "Series a * c" with "Series (fun n : nat => a n * c)".
